name: Zebra Blinds
description: Modern dual-layered zebra blinds that let you adjust light and privacy with a sleek, minimalist stripe design.

name: Faux Wood Blinds
description: Durable, moisture‑resistant faux-wood blinds that mimic real wood—the perfect low-maintenance option for any room.

name: Blackout Blinds
description: Engineered to block 100% of sunlight—ideal for nurseries, bedrooms, or media rooms where complete darkness is needed.

name: Roman Shades
description: Elegantly stackable when opened and smooth when down—Roman shades bring a tailored, timeless look to any space.

name: Roller Blinds
description: Clean, functional roller blinds that are easy to operate—great for both homes and offices.

name: Venetian Blinds
description: Adjustable horizontal slats (wood, PVC, or aluminum) offering precise control over light and privacy.

name: Cellular (Honeycomb) Shades
description: Energy-efficient honeycomb structure traps air for insulation, while offering soft, filtered light.

name: Vertical Blinds
description: Ideal for sliding doors and large windows, these vertical panels slide aside to open and tilt to control light.

name: Wooden Blinds
description: Classic, warm real-wood blinds that add premium style—best for dry indoor rooms like living areas and studies.

name: Motorized Blinds
description: For smart-home lovers, these blinds can be controlled via remote or app—great for high or hard-to-reach windows.
